org.mfg.mdb.compiler

Interface ICompilerListener


  • public interface ICompilerListener
    An interface to listen the files created by the compiler. External tools can use this to show a progress of the compilation.
    Author:
    arian

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void compiledFile(java.io.File file, boolean replacing)
      Method called when a file is created.

      • compiledFile

                  boolean replacing)
        Method called when a file is created.
        Parameters:
        file - The file is created.
        replacing - If it is replacing an old file.
